english.segment1: Songs in the night are sung in the city of refuge. Songs in the night are sung in the city of refuge. I call you out to choose your side. Find the truth amongst the lies. Find the truth amongst the lies. I want to see your tears. I want to see anger. Bring out your fears. Take them out on me. Songs in the night are sung in the city of refuge. Songs in the night are sung in the city of refuge.
